summary: The diff implements all requirements for fixing custom sticker pricing for sports categories. Backend migration adds category support, price storage remains in paise (Nat), frontend forms convert rupees to paise (ร100), and display components convert paise to rupees (รท100). Console logging added throughout for debugging. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module that migrates old custom stickers to new schema with category field defaulting to #sports
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention data migration or handling existing custom stickers without categories. The migration.mo file adds migration logic not requested in requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple sticker categories beyond sports (animals, food, cartoon, patterns)
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements focus specifically on sports stickers (table tennis and badminton). While REQ-2 and REQ-4 mention 'all product categories', the context is sports items. The diff implements five categories including non-sports ones.

hallucinated_features.description: Upload progress tracking functionality for sticker images
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in BuildRequest requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: File type and size validation (max 5MB, image types only)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not specified in requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Image error handling with fallback icon display
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in requirements or acceptance criteria.
